DOC.criteria: NonSmall Cell Lung Cancer Patients Documented diagnosis nonsmall cell lung cancer , stage time point course treatment ( i.e. , diagnosis , treatment , post treatment surveillance ) Measurable disease CT scan within past 4 week Healthy volunteer Nonsmoking , define < 5 packs/year history smoke cessation smoking â‰¥ 6 month ago OR never smoker Not regularly expose ( i.e. , daily ) secondhand smoke Severe underlie lung disease ( i.e. , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease FEV_1 < 1.0 L , pulmonary fibrosis , bronchiectasis , cystic fibrosis , etc . ) determine enrol researcher . Written consent must give subject control .
